snippet: ALPERSON--June Natalie Maisel, March 30, 2016. Beloved wife of 62 years to Leo (deceased May 24, 2007). Loving mother of Ruth, Myra and Philip, mother-in-law of Jane, doting grandmother of Jeremy, Sadie and Reva. Also survived by devoted companion Grace "Ama" Acolatse. Gracious, learned and loving, kind and generous, she was born on August 22, 1924, in Brooklyn, NY, and studied Romance languages at Brooklyn College, Middlebury College and Columbia University. She taught for many years at Scarsdale High School. Graveside services Friday, April 1, 2016, 11am, Sharon Gardens Cemetery, Valhalla, NY. Shiva Sunday, April 3, 11am-5pm at home of June Alperson, White Plains, NY. Donations in her memory to National Multiple Sclerosis Society. 1/3
